review: In one word: terrible.I have a Roku 3 and it is fantastic.  It has the Chromecast Youtube app and I have no problems with it.  Unfortunately I can't stream my desktop to it.The Chromecast drops connection constantly, restarts at times, can turn on a TV but not off.  It would be useful if I could listen to my music on it longer than 5 minutes.
author: Zach

review: The Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player is very good for streaming movies.  What I like best  about it is that you don't have to have a lot of bulky equipment.First, I had connected to my laptop; however, it tied up my laptop with the streaming and I couldn't use the laptop to check mail, etc. while watching movies.  So I connected to my tablet and the streaming is great.  I like the feature of using the tablet as a remote control when watching movies.
author: Carol A Carroll

review: I rented a movie on Google Play in HD & tried streaming it through Chromecast via my laptop. It buffered every ten to fifteen minutes. I should have bought the Roku Streaming Stick instead, although I might have had the same problem with that too. I am returning this product to Amazon for a refund and from now on will just use my HDMI Cable to play movies or TV shows on my TV via my laptop, which is fine. Chromecast is basically just a wireless HDMI cable is all. It doesn't even have a user interface or a remote. For $15.00 more I would buy a Roku Streaming stick (in the link below) which doesn't have ridiculous buffering times.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00BGGDVOO/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B00BGGDVOO&linkCode;=as2&tag;=dan010f-20&linkId;=NAY7ZD4IRWRFP7EF
